name: Pollie
description:
PLEASE USE FULLSCREEN FOR WEBGL!

Welcome to Pollie! In this game, you play the role as a scientist who is experimenting and trying to get a rollie pollie to roll down a series of platforms in order to get to the goal! Forge a path using your limited set of platforms and physics!

Controls:

Tab - Toggle start and stop buttons visibility.

Q - Toggle platforms menu visibility.

Movement - Click & drag to move the platforms and use scrollwheel to rotate them.

Credits:

Game by FlamingSparrow

Music from OpenGameArt

Made for Weekly Game Jam #153

Thanks For Playing!
